title: Notes - ex forti dulcedo.
description: Maarten Steenhagen is a philosopher and writer. This is his website. You will find notes, essays, and academic papers.

items.title: O Captain! My Captain!
items.summary: O Captain! my Captain! our fearful trip is done;1 The ship has weatherâ€™d every rack, the prize we sought is won, The port is near, the bells I hear, the people all exulting, While follow eyes the steady keel, the vessel grim and daring; But O heart! heart! heart! O the bleeding drops of red, Where on the deck my Captain lies, Fallen cold and dead. O Captain! my Captain!
